page.shortlink: UX viewbox properties global events on draw
page.description: Fires whenever the viewbox control is drawn or re-drawn.

section.description: The onDraw event takes as an argument a pointer to the element that the viewbox drawn into. The onDraw event takes place after the HTML used in the viewbox has been updated or inserted into the viewbox. This event can fire regardless of whether or not the viewbox is connected to a data source. The onDraw event fires after the onBeforeDraw event has fired and before the onPopulate event fires.
